translations: [计] 千兆比特，吉比特（10的9次方比特，相当于十亿比特的信息单位）

sentences.sentence: The test result indicates that this interface has reached line rate performance of ten gigabits.
sentences.translation: 测试结果表明，该接口实现了十路千兆的线速处理的性能要求。

sentences.sentence: Just like software always expands to fill the memory available, apps that eat gigabits will doubtless appear.
sentences.translation: 就像软件不停扩充占满所有可用内存，各种应用服务无疑也会吞噬千兆位。

sentences.sentence: The data rate of this initial chip is 2.5 gigabits per second; the architecture supports a rate of 10 gigabits per second.
sentences.translation: 首批芯片的数据率为2.5吉比特每秒；该架构支持10吉比特每秒的速率。
